issue.title: [Java] add ValueVector constructors that take a Field object
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Each instance of a ValueVector instantiates Field and FieldType object, which consume 81 bytes of heap space. This duplication be avoided in cases where all the ValueVectors belong to the same set of columns/schema.
